meanings.definition: (adjective) most extreme or superlative form of 'doggone'
meanings.sent1: That was the doggonest storm I've ever seen!
meanings.sent2: She is the doggonest singer in our school.
meanings.sent3: The doggonest cat kept stealing my socks!
meanings.sent4: His doggonest determination led him to success.
meanings.sent5: The doggonest mountain stood tall against the sky.

meanings.definition: (adverb) used for emphasis or intensification, similar to 'very' or 'extremely'
meanings.sent1: She ran doggonest fast to catch the bus.
meanings.sent2: He worked doggonest hard to finish the project on time.
meanings.sent3: The doggonest squirrel quickly climbed the tree.
meanings.sent4: The music played doggonest loud at the concert.
meanings.sent5: The cake smelled doggonest delicious as it baked in the oven.
